Name: Hentai! Waifu Puzzles
About the game: Introduction Hentai! Waifu Puzzles is a relaxing puzzle game. Freely browse and search for the waifu of your dreams, there are over 80 in total, then once you've made your decision press the shuffle button and enjoy! Your waifu puzzle will then be randomized and you can re-arrange the pieces to its initial starting position. No need to rush, there is no time limit in this game so be sure to relax and enjoy this at your own leisure. For those wanting to push themselves, there is an optional timer that can keep track of completion time ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) Once an image has been completed, you can view it anytime in the Gallery mode. See if you can complete all 80 puzzles! Features 80 Beautiful Hentai Waifus to choose from! Timer to compare best/previous times Relaxing Piano + Lofi Soundtrack Gallery to unlock and view all previous completed levels Waifus of all types included!
